overview: Sebastian is an entrepreneur & active investor in the area of internet related businesses in China. He made his first experiences in China in 2003 & since then has built a strong passion & expertise for the country. In 2005, he founded his first company (lead generation). Since 2006, Sebastian is active with Business Angel investments & co-founded Taishan, Chinaâ€™s most successful & influential Angel Fund in 2008. Investments include Lashou.com, VIPStore.com, Urbanara.com and Ushi.cn. He graduated from European School of Business (ESB) & Lancaster University Management School with distinction (Accenture Prize for Outstanding Overall Performance as best in class).
